long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This innovative add-in will allow users of IFS Cloud by the IFS Corportation, to move data between environments in an easy manner. 

The add-in features a simple clipboard syncronisation ability to allow users to use the standard Copy/Paste functions in IFS Cloud and IFS Apps 10 Aurena interfaces.
